name: Bonecruncher's Energy Block
description: Randomly Discard 1 card from your Hand whose original Elemental Dice Cost is the highest and create 1 Elemental Die of the same Type as your active character. If your active character is a Consecrated Beast, then they gain 1 Energy. (Can play 1 such card per Round)
descriptionraw: Randomly $[K56] 1 card from your Hand whose original Elemental Dice Cost is the highest and create 1 Elemental Die of the same Type as your active character. If your active character is a {SPRITE_PRESET#3506}Consecrated Beast, then they gain 1 $[K310]. (Can play 1 such card per Round)
descriptionreplaced: Randomly <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color> 1 card from your Hand whose original Elemental Dice Cost is the highest and create 1 Elemental Die of the same Type as your active character. If your active character is a {SPRITE_PRESET#3506}Consecrated Beast, then they gain 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>. (Can play 1 such card per Round)
